Play:
The Priest in Exile
(Heike nyōgo no shima / 平家女護島)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1719

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Keene, Donald, Bunraku: The Art of the Japanese Puppet Theatre (Tokyo: Kodansha International, 1973); Bunraku February 1986, October 1986 Performance Programs; Traditional Japanese Theater: An Anthology of Plays, edited by Karen Brazell (New York: Columbia University Press, 1998)

– Click image to view.

Performances:

November 1971: The Priest in Exile

August 1977 Hokkaido Tour: The Priest in Exile

January 1978: The Priest in Exile

October 1984: The Priest in Exile

February 1986: The Priest in Exile

October 1986: The Priest in Exile

December 1989 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

December 1978 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

December 1984 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

June 1984 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

July 1992: The Priest in Exile

February 1995: The Priest in Exile

December 1997 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

December 2000 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Priest in Exile

Characters:

Azumaya (Shunkan tsuma Azumaya / 俊寛妻あづまや)

Lady-in-waiting (Jyōrō / 上臈)

Moritsugu (Ecchū Jirōbyōe Moritsugu / 越中次郎兵衛盛次)

Noritsune (Notonokami Noritsune / 能登守教経)

Kikuo (Warawa Kikuō / 童菊王)

Kiyomori (Heishōkoku Kiyomori / 平相国清盛)

Ario (Ariōmaru / 有王丸)

Tomokata (Geshinojirō Tomokata / 下司次郎友方)

Shunkan (Shunkan Sōzu / 俊寛僧都)

Yasuyori (Heihangan Yasuyori / 平判官康頼)

Naritsune (Tanbano Shōshō Naritsune / 丹波少将成経)

Chidori (Ama Chidori / 蜑千鳥)

Seno-o (Senō Tarō Kaneyasu / 瀬尾太郎兼康)

Motoyasu (Tansaemon Motoyasu / 丹左衛門元康)

Former Emperor Goshirkawa (Goshirakawa Hōō / 後白河法皇)

Boatman (Sendō / 船頭)

Servants (Zōshiki / 雑色)
